name: Breakout Ping Pong
description:
Relive the golden days of the breakout genre! It is time to prove your brick breaker skills in a combination of Pinball and Pong.

Blast your way through a variety of levels where you control a paddle with your (mouse - keyboard - joystick) keeping one or more balls by deflecting them into a field of bricks on the screen without missing the only ball in play.

Failure to do so results in you losing a life. 

Some blocks go down with a single hit, Others are indestructible, some blow up with explosive.

Play with your friends or Ai with up to 4 players on a shared screen,

two different multiplayer modes with 5 levels to play with custom round rules.

  • arcade mode with 70 challenging levels
  • Great variety of explosive, indestructible,  and multi-hit bricks, some with special abilities
  • 10+ power-ups and power-downs
  • combos
  • Dynamic Ball speed
  • colourful atmosphere
  • 2 multiplayer modes to play with friends or against ai
  • set round rules as you wish
